snippet: Justice Stephen G. Breyer took 19 trips that were paid for by private sponsors, according to a cursory list of trips and gifts to Supreme Court justices.
abstract: Financial disclosure forms of Supreme Court justices reveal insight into demanding schedules of extrajudicial appearances, as well as fact that justices took many trips that were paid for by private sponsors.

byline.contributor: Eric Lipton contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Justice Stephen G. Breyer took 19 trips that were paid for by private sponsors, according to a cursory list of trips and gifts to Supreme Court justices.

headline.main: Justices Disclose Privately Paid Trips and Gifts
headline.print_headline: Justices, Led by Breyer, Took Scores of Privately Paid Trips During 2015, Disclosures Show
